sentences.en: "It's a nice piece of jewellery though, isn't it?"
sentences.cn: “可这是一件漂亮的首饰，不是吗？”

sentences.en: Even though I'm quite a reserved person, I like meeting people.
sentences.cn: 我虽然性格极为内敛，但喜欢和人接触。

sentences.en: Her nostrils were pinkish, as though she had a cold.
sentences.cn: 她的鼻孔略带粉红，好像患了感冒似的。

sentences.en: His most prized time, though, will be spent quietly on his farm.
sentences.cn: 不过，他最宝贵的时光将在自己的农场里平静地度过。

sentences.en: I still love you even though I'd like to wring your neck.
sentences.cn: 虽然我想掐死你，但我还是爱你的。

sentences.en: It sounds like a lot of fun. Isn’t it rather risky though?
sentences.cn: 听上去很有趣。可是这不是也很危险吗？

sentences.en: Pascal went ahead with the experiment even though he knew it was dangerous.
sentences.cn: 虽然帕斯卡知道这个试验很危险，但他仍然进行下去。

sentences.en: The company treated me as though I were skiving.
sentences.cn: 公司对待我的态度就好像是我上班时溜号了似的。

sentences.en: They felt as though they had done something discreditable and unclean.
sentences.cn: 他们觉得自己仿佛做了什么龌龊丢脸之事。

sentences.en: They looked at her as though she was crackers.
sentences.cn: 他们那样看着她，好像她疯了一样。

sentences.en: They may feel tired and though outwardly calm, can be irritable.
sentences.cn: 他们或许会感到疲惫，虽然外表看似没事，但可能很容易发火。

sentences.en: This site remained undiscovered, though long sought, until recent times.
sentences.cn: 虽经长期寻找，但该遗址直到最近才被发现。

sentences.en: Though he had a temper and could be nasty, it never lasted.
sentences.cn: 虽然他爱发脾气，而且有时还很讨厌，但向来都只是一阵儿。

sentences.en: Though his background was modest, it was in no sense deprived.
sentences.cn: 尽管他家境一般，但也并不算贫穷。

sentences.en: Though off-puttingly complicated in detail, local taxes are in essence simple.
sentences.cn: 虽然地税在细节上复杂得要命，但在本质上却很简单。

sentences.en: Though she’s almost 40, she still plans to compete.
sentences.cn: 尽管已经快40岁了，她仍然打算参加比赛。

sentences.en: Though Sybbis complained bitterly, Mama would not let up on her.
sentences.cn: 尽管西比斯大发牢骚，但妈妈不会放她一马。

sentences.en: Though ten years old, this book is highly recommended.
sentences.cn: 尽管是10年前出版的，这本书仍值得大力推荐。

sentences.en: Two heart attacks in a year. It hasn’t stopped him smoking, though.
sentences.cn: 一年里心脏病发作了两次，可是那也没让他把烟戒掉。

phrases.tran_cn: 走过；排练；经历；从头到尾地阅读

trans.tran_en: used after adding a fact, opinion, or question which seems surprising after what you have just said, or which makes what you have just said seem less true

trans.tran_cn: 虽然，尽管，不过，可是，然而
trans.tran_en: used to introduce a statement that makes the main statement coming after it seem surprising, unlikely, or unexpected

trans.tran_cn: 虽然， 可是， 尽管
trans.tran_en: used after adding a fact, opinion, or question which seems surprising after what you have just said, or which makes what you have just said seem less true
